Downloading bus route and stop data takes about 2 minutes and uses between 1M and 2M of data. Downloading on wifi is recommended but not required.

Version 0.1 (alpha). Although this app uses data from the London Transit Commission (LTC) website it is not affiliated with the LTC. Do *not* report problems with this app to the LTC. Report problems to frasermccrossan@gmail.com. 

If you have a problem with this app, I would like to hear from you and have an opportunity to fix it before you leave a bad review. This app is completely free to use and does not have ads.

This screen shows stops matching the search text. If GPS is enabled, they are the stops closest to you, else they are the ones you have checked most often. 

If the search is only digits, it matches both stop numbers (on the blue signs) and stops containing numbers (e.g. "1102 Jalna NB"). If there are any non-digits, it just matches stop names. 

Case is ignored, and multiple, partial words work. For example to find stops at Dundas and Richmond, try "dun rich".
